name: Advanced Diplomacy
ability: At the end of the round, you and another player gain 1 .
flavour: Strength through unity.

name: Advanced Railguns
ability: Discard a card to gain 2 extra in the next battle you're in.
flavour: The weapons of the future bringing death today!

name: Asteroid Outposts
ability: Remove a raid anywhere in the galaxy.
flavour: Silently, they wait in fear, vigilant for the time they are needed. As soon as Tjizik gets back from his lunch break, that is.

name: Battlefield Tractor Fields
ability: Gain 1 whenever you are attacked.
flavour: Funny the bits and bobs you find.

name: Beautiful Creations
ability: At the end of each round, you gain 1 if you control fewer than 15 .
flavour: No other can rival the beauty that your kind creates.

name: Black Hole Bomb
ability: All systems in the centre of the galaxy lose 1 .
flavour: Death has no face.

name: Cloning Vats
ability: You gain 1 extra when training units with develop orders.
flavour: You'll be your own right hand man.

name: Coup
ability: You become the new Emperor. The old Emperor loses all abilities and is no longer the Emperor. You resolve the next order.
flavour: I am the Senate.

name: Crash the Economy
ability: All other players lose 4 .
flavour: Well if I can't have money, neither can you.
Notes: Nobody buys this card when it costs 4 credits, and it's not interesting when it costs 3. I don't care for it

name: Cybernetic Implants
ability: At the end of each round, you gain 1 if you control more than 4 upgrades.
flavour: Maths is easy when you implant yourself with a calculator. Murder too it turns out.

name: Dark Matter Research Centers
ability: Buying cards costs you 1 less .
flavour: State of the art, and reasonably priced too.

name: Emergency Drill Training
ability: Train 1 .
flavour: One minute, you're drinking blue milk with your aunt - the next, you're blowing up interstellar battle stations.

name: Dyson Spheres
ability: You gain 2 at the end of every round.
flavour: With the power of an entire star at their disposal, the galaxy suddenly felt very small.

name: EMP
ability: Choose an upgrade controlled by a player. For the rest of the round, ignore its effects.
flavour: How about we level the playing field?
Notes: Is this vague? Will people think only the person playing the card has to ignore the effects?

name: Espionage
ability: Destroy any upgrade and move it to the discard pile. The controller gains equal to its cost.
flavour: The name's Fjutip, Flobob Fjutip.

name: Establish Galactic Market
ability: Each player chooses a card from their hand and passes it to the player on their left.
flavour: Some say the Galactic Market is the true ruler of this forsaken galaxy.
Notes: I don’t like this card because I don't find it very fun

name: Exchange Military Tech
ability: Two players of your choice train 2 .
flavour: Your 3000 series plasma cannons would look great on our Z class frigates.

name: Fusion Power Plants
ability: At the end of each round, you gain 1 for each upgrade you control.
flavour: It's elementary my dear.

name: Gaia World
ability: At the end of each round, you gain 1 if you control more than 6 systems.
flavour: This world's unbound riches could support our people for millennia.

name: Gamma Lasers
ability: All players gain 1 extra when attacking.
flavour: Deadly lasers go brrrr.
Notes: Possibly should cost 0? The develop to deploy this might be expense enough

name: Intel exchange
ability: At the start of each round, you and another player gain 1 extra in all battles for that round.
flavour: Know your enemy, and we know them well.

name: Heavy Torpedos
ability: Gain 1 extra in battles.
flavour: Some of the finest weapons the Galactic Market has to offer.

name: Medical Nanobots
ability: Lose 1 less when taking casualties in a battle.
flavour: Your new invisible best friend.

name: Migration Treaty
ability: At the end of each round, you and another player train 1 .
flavour: Xeno... Together... Strong.

name: Monument to Heros
ability: Gain 1 when you attack.
flavour: Remember the heroes of our past and they will watch over us from the realms of the dead.

name: Mystical Space Typhoon
ability: Destroy any upgrade and move it to the discard pile. The controller gains equal to its cost.
flavour: Is this a Yu-Gi-Oh reference? Maybe, but we’re definitely getting sued for saying Yi-Gi-Oh two times too many.

name: Organic Matter Processing Labs
ability: Whenever you destroy a unit, gain 1 .
flavour: Who knew intestines could be so useful?

name: Outlaw Technology
ability: Put the current 4 face up cards into the discard pile. Replace them with cards from the top of the deck.
flavour: It was too dangerous: think what it could do in the wrong hands.

name: Overwhelming Industry
ability: You gain 5 at the end of the game if you control the greatest number of systems.
flavour: The glow of our space forges will outshine the stars.

name: Overwhelming Military
ability: You gain 5 at the end of the game if you control the greatest number of units.
flavour: Only a fool would challenge me in battle.
Notes: People seem to achieve this often when they have it? So it's slightly more expensive

name: Overwhelming Serenity
ability: You gain 5 at the end of the game if you control the least number of units.
flavour: Through peace, we will become enlightened.

name: Overwhelming Technology
ability: You gain 5 at the end of the game if you have the greatest number of upgrades.
flavour: Through science, even the gods will envy our power.

name: Overwhelming Authority
ability: You gain 5 at the end of the game if you are the Emperor.
flavour: Bow before your Emperor.
Notes: Easier to accomplish than the others so more expensive

name: Pacifist Society
ability: Gain 2 if you didn't attack anyone this round at the end of the round.
flavour: War: what is it good for?

name: Planetary Shields
ability: Gain 1 extra when defending in battles.
flavour: Kra'zix liked the comforting warm fuzzy feeling each time he saw the red glow of the BnL SH.131D.

name: Political Infrastructure
ability: At the end of each round, you gain 1 if you are the Emperor.
flavour: I love democracy.

name: Psyonic Augmentation
ability: Reroll 1 rolled by any player each round.
flavour: Space wizards rule!

name: Rapid Militarisation
ability: For each player with more units than you, train 1 anywhere you control.
flavour: We will fight them in the nebula, we will fight them in the spiral arms; we shall never surrender.

name: Red Dwarf Forge
ability: Train 1 or gain 1 or gain 1 whenever you buy a card.
flavour: The glow of the forge will outlive almost everything in this galaxy.

name: Red Matter Thrusters
ability: Gain 1 extra in battles when attacking.
flavour: I am speed.

name: Reform the Government
ability: Discard any number of cards from your hand. Then draw cards equal to the number discarded.
flavour: There's nothing as refreshing as an overhaul of your entire political system.

name: Research Agreement
ability: At the end of each round, you and another player may exchange a card in each players hand. Both players must agree to the exchange.
flavour: Two heads are better than one.

name: Reverse Engineering Labs
ability: Gain 1 when you attack.
flavour: Your new ship designs appear very powerful, mind if I take a look?

name: Ring Worlds
ability: You gain 1 for every 6 you have at the end of a round.
flavour: An oasis in the stars, made at the cost of a small fortune.

name: Ruthless Military
ability: You may sacrifice a supporting unit once per round before a battle to gain 2 extra in the supported battle.
flavour: Either come back victorious or dead.

name: Sabotage
ability: When you are attacked by a player, immediately destroy 2 of the attacking units. The attacker may then choose to cancel the attack.
flavour: This is why we can't have nice things.

name: Search for the Ancient Ones
ability: Look at the top and bottom card of the deck. Add one to your hand and leave the other in place.
flavour: They're out their somewhere, and with them, they contain the knowledge to make us powerful beyond belief.

name: Ship Scrapyards
ability: At the end of the round you may destroy and discard any upgrade you control and receive equal to the cost.
flavour: Reuse, reduce, recycle.

name: Spy Network
ability: You may look at the top card of the card deck. Once per round, you may reveal and buy the top card of the deck.
flavour: Whispers can topple empires.

name: Superconductor Circuitry
ability: You gain 1 extra when using develop orders to gain credits.
flavour: Finally, Glorzo could enjoy his games at 6000 FPS.

name: Swarmer Missiles
ability: Reroll all 1s you roll.
flavour: One of 'em will get ya.

name: Tachyon Sensors
ability: Look at the cards in another player's hand. Then, you may buy a card.
flavour: A glimpse at the future was all I needed...

name: Tactical Retreat
ability: Play at the end of a battle. Lose 2 fewer units if you were defeated.
flavour: Lose now to fight another day.

name: Trade Route
ability: At the end of each round, you and another player gain 1 .
flavour: We have a lot to gain in this agreement. Although of course, I'll gain more.

name: Unified Populace
ability: At the end of each round, you gain 1 if you control more than 14 .
flavour: We work towards one vision.

name: Urban Warfare Training
ability: Gain 2 extra when attacking systems in the centre of the galaxy.
flavour: The concrete jungle is the prime hunting grounds for some.

name: Warp Speed II
ability: A support order you control can support any battle in the galaxy.
flavour: Is that a two or an eleven? Who knows, what matters is that it's fast.
Notes: capital letter i in the name so the number looks more ambiguous

name: Zobin Zood
ability: Starting with you, each player declares how many credits they have. Then, each player with more credits than you must give you a credit.
flavour: A crack shot with a plasma rifle.
